# Trustee holly mautz

Trustee Holly Mautz                                             970-250-3660                                                                              
[hmautz@gmail.com](mailto:jan.gage1234@gmail.com)

Trustee Mautz has lived in Orchard City since 2007. She was appointed to the Planning Commission in 2021, and served as Chairman until being appointed to the Board of Trustees to fill a vacated term. Trustee Mautz was then elected to serve a four year term starting in 2022. Trustee Mautz enjoys gardening, reading, playing by the water, and going on adventures with her family. Trustee Mautz considers it an honor and a privilege to serve on the Orchard City Board of Trustees.

Trustee Mautz serves the Town on Juvenile Diversion, Delta One and Park Committees

![Orchard City Mautz](https://www.orchardcityco.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3057 "Orchard City Mautz")
